message_version.description: The `messageVersion` value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

trans_status.description: The `transStatus` value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

authentication_value.description: The `authenticationValue` value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

eci.description: The `eci` value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

ds_trans_id.description: The `dsTransID` value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

three_ds_server_trans_id.description: The `threeDSServerTransID` value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.
